45-54 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $5$5$4$I have been taking Lorazapam 1 mg 2 x daily for panic attacks a sleeping problems.It has helped me greatly in both areas.I was taking Xanax for 10 years bedore 1mg 3 x daily and found that the Lorazapam better.I know that they are basically the same drug but I don't have the dreams that I was having on xanax.
